headline: Starbucks Is Testing A New Latte That Tastes Exactly Like Guinness
content: The best part of waking up is the taste of Guinness in your cup.BuzzFeed StaffBEER FLAVORED COFFEE, YOU GUYS.It's available now in select test markets, but no word on when the drink will be available nationwide. When I was in Columbus, OH a few weeks ago, I tried the Dark Barrel Latte, and it does taste remarkably like stout.*There isn't actually any beer in the drink.Get all the best Tasty recipes in your inbox!
